citeinfo.origin: U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), Alaska Biological Science Center, Marine and Freshwater Ecology Branch
citeinfo.title: Sediment Heavy Metal Data Sources for the Bering and Chukchi Sea.

descript.abstract: An annotated bibliography of sediment heavy metal data sources for the Bering and Chukchi Seas. The index includes references to journal articles, agency reports, maps and raw data. Important characteristics of data sources are identified: geographic extent, elements sampled, extraction and analysis methods, depth of sample in sediment, number of sampling stations and availability of station coordinates.
descript.purpose: ABSC is building this database to determine the geographic extent of sediment heavy metal data and evaluate its suitability for use in marine animal research.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
